name: Top down heroes
description:
Hey folks,

Here you are going to see a little top-down shooting game. For now multiplayer only It is a very early prototype and I am still working on it.

Features:

  • Lobby creating (hosting game)
  • find a hosted game and join
  • Keyboard Movement and mouse aiming
  • Shooting
  • Gun sound

future features going to be:

  • Animations and effects
  • better player-movement
  • new UI ((testing)currently just using a free asset from unity store)
  • settings (Video, control and game settings).
  • more maps
  • and the list continues

I would be happy if you could drop a comment, what you think about this game down below.

And obviously as you can see I am not very good in modelling or animating :-)

thanks a lot.
